definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He has a PhD in computer science from Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有斯坦福大学计算机科学博士学位。

sentences.english: He's been wait-listed for a football scholarship to Stanford .
sentences.chinese: 他已被列入斯坦福大学的美式足球奖学金等候者名单。

sentences.english: Stanford chemical engineer Zhenan Bao is working on just such a thing.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福大学化学工程师鲍哲南正在研究这样的材料。

sentences.english: He is currently the Paul L. & Phyllis Wattis Professor in Art, Department of Art & Art History, Stanford University, California.
sentences.chinese: 他目前是加州斯坦福大学艺术与艺术史系的终身教授。

sentences.english: A prison was mocked up in the basement of a Stanford University building.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福大学一幢建筑的地下室被伪装成了一座监狱。

sentences.english: What do you think is the benefit of being a Stanford student?
sentences.chinese: 作为一个斯坦福大学的学生，你认为有什么益处？

sentences.english: What do you think of the social life at Stanford?
sentences.chinese: 你对斯坦福大学的社交活动怎么看？

sentences.english: Our notation was adapted from that of Professor Kane of Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 我们的标记法是改编自斯坦福大学的甘教授的。

sentences.english: Is everyone else in Stanford MBA amazing like you?
sentences.chinese: 每个斯坦福大学的工商管理硕士都像你这么优秀吗？

sentences.english: Nor did he look at Stanford, just up the road and likely to offer a scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福大学虽然离家近且有奖学金，他却也没看上眼。

sentences.english: This did not let Stanford college researcher feel crestfallen.
sentences.chinese: 这并没有让斯坦福大学研究人员感到气馁。

sentences.english: He is a graduate of both Tsinghua and Stanford Universities.
sentences.chinese: 张建宇博士先后毕业于清华大学与斯坦福大学。

sentences.english: OTL is responsible for managing the intellectual property assets of Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 技术许可办公室负责管理斯坦福大学的知识产权财产。

sentences.english: Brown is now a research associate in the Psychology Department at Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 作者目前是斯坦福大学心理系副研究员。

sentences.english: Why'd you decide to come to Stanford MBA?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么决定来读斯坦福大学的工商管理硕士呢？

sentences.english: The Department of Computer Science is part of the Stanford School of Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 计算机系是斯坦福大学工程学院的一部分。

pinyin: Ka3 nei4 ji1 Mei2 long2 Da4 xue2
Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2

definition: California Institute of Technology (Caltech)/abbr. for 加利福尼亞理工學院|加利福尼亚理工学院

Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
